data.actual_result: No popup comes and you can't exit the permission screen because of the screen shaking.
data.expected_result: The regular "Save changes" popup will appear since you changed permissions
data.short_description: Lurking in Channel Settings, then getting Manage Permission Rights doesn't get the "Save changes" popup
data.steps_to_repro: - get a role with Manage Channel only - Go to a channel and view the Channel Settings (e.g. Overview) - have someone give you Manage Permissions - Try to change the permissions of the channel you are viewing - Observe
